about_the_game:
“Shikamaru's Tale" Extra Scenario Pack includes:

Scenario "The Fresh Green of the Hidden Leaf" part

4 Combination secret techniques:
- Naruto (7th Hokage)×Boruto
- Kiba×Shino×Hinata
- Asuma×Shikamaru
- Hokages

1 new costume:
- Naruto (7th Hokage)

Costumes from previous series:
Matching voice
Ninja Info Cards
Ninja Treasure

*One of the Secret Technique can’t be used unless obtaining pre-order bonus content : Naruto (7th Hokage)×Boruto

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows (64bit) 7 or higher up to date
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo, 3.0GHz - AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6400+ 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
